name: Get Traffic Stats for ActiveCampaign leads with DataForSEO
description: Streamline your sales process by integrating DataForSEO Organic Traffic Stats with ActiveCampaign to evaluate your leads based on their website visitor volume. Gain valuable insights to prioritize prospects and boost lead management. To get started, check our [Setup Guide for First Use](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13xLcjzI7LkOFq8nD9T_9fPEboFtgfJ0H6FgE2Uw8HME/edit?usp=sharing).
